articles.content: The development of AI tools may have some negative consequences. A study by Cornell University in the United States found that AI tools could be used to steal passwords with near-perfect accuracy. Th… [+2895 chars]

articles.title: Boult launches Crown R, Drift 2 smartwatches and W40 TWS earbuds - Times of India
articles.description: India-based Boult introduces new wearables to its portfolio, including two smartwatches and TWS earbuds. The Drift 2 smartwatch is priced at Rs 1,499
articles.content: Q Click Blues 1 TWS earbuds go on sale in India for the first time at Rs 1,299Q Click has launched its first product, the Blues 1 earbuds, in India. With Bluetooth 5.3 and 13mm Bass Pro drivers, the … [+173 chars]

articles.author: Pihu Yadav
articles.title: Noise launches Buds VS106 wireless earbuds at Rs 1,299 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The Noise Buds VS106 come in three colour options — Jet Black, Sky Blue, and Cloud White. They are now available for purchase on Amazon and gonoise.com at a price of just Rs 1,299.

articles.author: Ashish Khaitan
articles.title: Amazon 5th Gear Quiz answers today: Win Rs 5,000 (20 winners) - Pricebaba Daily
